text:
Stage III Paranasal Sinus and Nasal Cavity Cancer
		                    Treatment of stage III paranasal sinus and nasal cavity cancer depends on where cancer is found in the paranasal sinuses and nasal cavity.   If cancer is in the maxillary sinus, treatment may include the following:          -  High-dose radiation therapy before or after surgery.    - A clinical trial of fractionated radiation therapy before or after surgery.        If cancer is in the ethmoid sinus, treatment may
